text: Less Than Zero is a 1987 drama movie directed by Marek Kanievska and is adapted from the Bret Easton Ellis 1985 novel of the same name. It stars Andrew McCarthy, James Spader, Robert Downey Jr., and Jami Gertz. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1987 romantic drama movies Category:1980s LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American LGBT movies
title: Less Than Zero (movie)
